headline: Verisk Analytics, Inc. Enters into $1.5 Billion Accelerated Share Repurchase Transaction
summary: JERSEY CITY, N.J., Feb. 23, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verisk Analytics, Inc. (Nasdaq: VRSK) (“Verisk” or the “Company”), a leading strategic data analytics and technology partner to the global insurance industry, today announced that it has entered into accelerated share repurchase agreements (“ASR Agreements”) with each of HSBC Bank USA, National Association and Wells Fargo Bank, National Association (the “ASR Counterparties”) to repurchase an aggregate of $1.5 billion of the Company’s common st
